titleStmt.title: The two last speeches of Thomas Wentworth, late Earle of Strafford, and deputy of Ireland The one in the Tower, the other on the scaffold on Tower-Hill, May the 12th 1641.
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.

editionStmt.edition: New revised by the perfectest coppy, with some additions, which was formerly omitted; with his private prayer, or ejaculations to almighty God.

notesStmt.note: With an illustrated title page, bearing the portrait of Strafford.
The authenticity of these speeches is disputed.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
